trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: A ratfolk rogue can use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

trait.name: Nimbleness
entries: A ratfolk rogue can move through the space of any creature size Medium or larger.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: A ratfolk rogue has advantage on its attack roll against a creature if at least one of the ratfolk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally is capable of attacking.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: A ratfolk rogue deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of one of its allies that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the rogue doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rat Dagger Flurry
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., three targets. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.
Hunting down Ella Loop (or the many manifestations thereof).
